attributes.action: Negotiate treaty with the EU that allow UK citizens to retain EU citizenship
attributes.additional_details: It could also give protection to EU citizens under the Human Rights Act within the UK and offer other benefits within the EU.
attributes.background: This would be largely symbolic and would be a counter to the growing nationalism within the UK which is a poison. It points to the ideal of international citizenship where borders become of little importance and would enable UK citizens to hold dual EU and UK nationality.
